pathAssistantSteps.info: Defining a productÂ request to ensure that you have clearly defined the Overall Product, and specified the team members that will be involved.
Designing a Program is mainly happening within CourseLoop, QUT's curriculum management tool. The result of the Design stage should be completed Program Plan and Associated Units or Modules.

Releasing a Program - This is ensuring that this product is ready to advertise the completed product. This is a multi step process.

  • Create the product to advertise - modify any content in the product for advertising purposes
  • Complete the Content for each Curriculum Item
  • Create Course Offerings to each module and unit
